channel.title: Courses on myPortfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on myPortfolio

item.title: ECET 227: AC to DC Pulse Electronics
item.author: lkrapukaitis@gmail.com (Lukas Krapukaitis)
item.description: ECET 227 focueses on the analysis and application of alternating current (AC) electrical circuits, which are fundamental to modern electronics and electrical systems…

item.title: ECET 229: Concurrent Digital Systems
item.author: lkrapukaitis@gmail.com (Lukas Krapukaitis)
item.description: In this course, I developed a strong foundation in design and analysis of concurrent digital systems using FPGA development boards and utilizing the Quartus simulation software…

item.title: CNIT 255: Object-Oriented Programming Introduction
item.author: lkrapukaitis@gmail.com (Lukas Krapukaitis)
item.description: CNIT 255 introduced core principles of modern software development through the lens of object-oriented programming (OOP).

item.title: CNIT 182: System and Organizational Security
item.author: lkrapukaitis@gmail.com (Lukas Krapukaitis)
item.description: This course explored the principles and practices behind securing complex systems at the organizational level.
